verbs.description: Update 1:56AM : [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: thanked] [ARG1: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] `` [ARG2: for taking the first bold step toward a bright new future for his people '' after the leaders ' historic Singapore summit] .

Update 1:56AM : President Donald Trump thanked [ARG0: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] `` for [V: taking] [ARG1: the first bold step toward a bright new future for his people ''] [ARGM-TMP: after the leaders ' historic Singapore summit] .
